member.name: T:MetalWeightCalculator.RoundBar
member.summary: Calculating the weight or length of a round bar made of different metals (steel pipes, stainless steel, copper, etc.).

member.name: M:MetalWeightCalculator.RoundBar.CalculateWeight(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the weight of a round bar.
member.param: Density of the metal from which the round bar is made in g/cm³.
member.returns: Weight of a round bar in kilograms.
member.exception: At least one of the passed arguments does not meet the parameter specification of the called method.

member.name: M:MetalWeightCalculator.RoundBar.CalculateLength(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculating the lenght of a round bar.
member.param: Density of the metal from which the round bar is made in g/cm³.
member.returns: Lenght of a round bar in millimetres.
member.exception: At least one of the passed arguments does not meet the parameter specification of the called method.
